data_table.description: Form 153 - Medication and Supplement Inventory: Barriers (WHI Extension)

variable.name: F153VY
variable.comment: Visit year in which this Form 153 was collected

variable.name: F153DAYS
variable.description: F153 Days since randomization or enrollment
variable.comment: Days since randomization or enrollment to receipt of Form 153

variable.name: F153EXTPHASE
variable.comment: The WHI Extension in which the Form 153 was collected

variable.name: F153CONT
variable.comment: The method used to collect the Form 153 data.

variable.name: F153FINDAYS
variable.comment: Days since randomization or enrollment to completion of Form 153

variable.name: F153BINSUR
variable.description: F153 Barrier: Health insurance would not cover
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): My health insurance would not cover the medication.

variable.name: F153BCOST
variable.description: F153 Barrier: Medication costs to much
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): The medication or copayment cost too much.

variable.name: F153BGOING
variable.description: F153 Barrier: Problem getting to medical facility
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): It is a problem for me to get to the medical facility/physician

variable.name: F153BINCONV
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): Taking the medication would be inconvenient.

variable.name: F153BSIDE
variable.description: F153 Barrier: Concerned about side effects
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): I was concerned about possible side effects or complications from the medication.

variable.name: F153BWORK
variable.description: F153 Barrier: Concerned about missing work
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): I was concerned about missing work due to taking the medication.

variable.name: F153BFAMILY
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): My family discouraged me from taking the medication.

variable.name: F153BFRIEND
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): My friends discouraged me from taking the medication.

variable.name: F153BTOOMANY
variable.description: F153 Barrier: Taking too many medications
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): I am taking too many medications.

variable.name: F153BDISLIKE
variable.description: F153 Barrier: Do not like taking medications
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): I don't like taking medications.

variable.name: F153BNONE
variable.description: F153 Barrier: Have not experienced any barriers
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking any medications that have been prescribed for you? (Please check all that apply.): I have not experienced any barriers to taking prescription medications.
